price: (Ingatlah) ketika kamu memohon pertolongan kepada Tuhan-mu, lalu diperkenankan-Nya bagimu, "Sesungguhnya Aku akan mendatangkan bala bantuan kepadamu dengan seribu malaikat yang datang berturut-turut".
arabic: إِذۡ تَسۡتَغِيثُونَ رَبَّكُمۡ فَٱسۡتَجَابَ لَكُمۡ أَنِّي مُمِدُّكُم بِأَلۡفٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ مُرۡدِفِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: idh tastaghīthūna rabbakum fa-is'tajāba lakum annī mumiddukum bi-alfin mina al-malāikati mur'difīna
